content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and provide a solution.

Analysis of the Main Target Image:
- The structure has 4 blocks in total
- It has 2 layers
- Bottom layer: 2 cubic blocks (1 red and 1 orange)
- Middle layer: 1 horizontal green rectangular block
- Top layer: 1 orange triangular/wedge block

Spatial Arrangement:
- Two cube blocks form the base, placed side by side
- A horizontal green rectangular block sits on top of the two cubes
- An orange triangular block sits on top of the green block

Block Selection from Dictionary:
I need:
- 1 red cube (block #4)
- 1 orange cube (block #3)
- 1 horizontal green rectangular block (block #6)
- 1 orange triangular block (block #12)

Assembly Order:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 4
    Step2: Move block with index 3
    Step3: Move block with index 6
    Step4: Move block with index 12
}

This assembly sequence builds from bottom to top, starting with the base cubes, then adding the horizontal green block, and finally placing the orange triangular piece on top.
